idea:
Bodhishop is India's leading startup in A2 milk and organic food industry. It's B2C platform enables farmers to sell products across the world with their brand name.

As the government encourages and promotes the use of cow by-products, startup Bodhishop is blazing the trail by ensuring the welfare of the cows as well as having a strong business model.


Read more at: https://yourstory.com/2019/09/mumbai-bodhishop-cow-products-startup

name: D41 COLOR DYNAMIC PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
About us :-

The Anugrah Agro Manufacturing & Exports Pvt Ltd company is formed with aim of doing exports of Agril product, small-scale industrial produce, and Indian handmade items, like khadi-gramodhyog products manufacturing, service providing activity, also dealing in the manufacturing of washing detergent powder, toiletries, cleaning agents


Our Aims :-

We are planning for export to the African developing countries. Europe, Gulf countries having tremendous demand for Indian agriculture products, like pulses, grain, masalas, edible oil.

Presently company is doing business in manufacturing / trading of washing detergent powder, toiletries, cleaning agents in Maharashtra, UP, & Goa.

Also manufacturing / trading of Indian agriculture products, like pulses, grain, masalas, edible oil.

We have developed re-known sources for volumetric supplies of the hand made products like carpet, jute bags, hand woven khadi cloth, natural produce fruits like mango, tamarind, apple etc having very big demand across the globe.

We are Manufacturer/ traders concentrating more on sale of the domestic produces having mass consumption and volumetric demand in its sector.


We are targeting lower class, middle class consumers; we are aiming at very big volumetric business having turnover yields.

India is emerging country having liberalized market policy, developed markets, well facilitated production facility, easy banking finance, and ample required talented, skilled staff, work force helps in achieving the desired , set goals of business.

Our products are very competitive in comparison to the established one, but having big value/cost difference, hence selling of our product is easy and gain able.
name: ANUGRAH AGRO MANUFACTURING & EXPORTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
myFoodHub is a start up company venturing into business of providing end to end integrated solution for Food Startups, Food Tech and Fresh Producer exporter and retailer.

We follow model wherein Food startups , Food tech and Fresh Produce Exporter and retailer can be provided with lease model to avoid Capex.


Whether you are looking for a QSR kitchen unit with special requirements, a central production for Value added Food Processing unit which requires high-care unit or Fresh Producer Exporter Company to improve your infrastructure or a kitchen unit/ Processing unit designed to support your online food delivery business/ Export business, we have the perfect Solutions for your needs. myFoodHub has a range of Solutions to support your business

Lower operational costs

Dramatically reduce your real estate, Infrastructure Cost and labour costs in exchange for higher margins. An ideal trade off for food businesses, where all you need is a Processing unit and a handful of staff to succeed.

Lower upfront costs

Avoid the potential upfront investment needed for a traditional brick and mortar Food Startup/ Food Company. With only a little upfront capital investment required and just 16 weeks deposit, you can rent a delivery-only or commercial kitchen/ processing unit / Precooler/ blast freezer / Cold Room/ Ripening Chamber in our facilities and be trading within a few days.

Expand with speed

Our team can help you find the right space for your size now, with on-site expansion options as an when required will available when you’re ready for them.
name: myFoodHub
